name: Menimals
description:
Fight, train, and travel with the Menimals you befriend, in Menimals! This fantasy strategy game has 50 unique characters, hundreds of single player battles, and real-time multiplayer. With no ads or in-app purchases, you won’t want to miss Menimals!

Key Features:

Complex Battles: Menimals revolves around 5v5 strategy battles. With 50 characters to choose from, there are millions of teams you can fight with. Create innovative teams and explore Menimal tactics to take down the competition.

3D Hub: Rather than a menu, spend time in our immersive hub. Here you can enter battles, upgrade your Menimals, expand your collection, and so much more. It’s quite peaceful here, so feel free to take a break from the battles to explore! Maybe you will discover some of our hidden gems…

Online Multiplayer: Battle against the world to climb the ranks! Our algorithms pair you against players of a similar level, so legendary battles are a certainty! Can you reach the Legend ranking?

Campaign: Unlock new characters as you journey across the world to save the free kingdoms. Discover secrets of the ancient world and make friends as you travel on your singleplayer quest.

Challenges: Extra singleplayer battles to test those who push the game to its limits. The later battles will challenge even the most skilled Menimal players.
